title: Engineering principles for building financial systems
dot:
digraph accounting_system{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style=filled, fontname="Arial", fontsize=12];subgraph cluster_definitions{label="Basic Financial Definitions";style=dashed;GL[label="General Ledger (GL)
Primary accounting record
of the company", shape=ellipse, color=lightblue];subledger[label="Sub-ledger
Detailed transactions per GL", shape=ellipse, color=lightblue];financial_record[label="Financial Record
GL + Sub-ledger", shape=ellipse, color=lightblue];materiality[label="Material
Misstatements that affect decision-making", shape=ellipse, color=lightblue];}subgraph cluster_goals{label="High-Level Goals of Accounting System";style=dashed;accurate[label="Accurate
Reflect known state of the business", shape=ellipse, color=lightgreen];auditable[label="Auditable
Detect errors, ensure compliance", shape=ellipse, color=lightgreen];timely[label="Timely
Meet business needs for financial data", shape=ellipse, color=lightgreen];}subgraph cluster_principles{label="Engineering Principles";style=dashed;immutability[label="Immutability & Durability
Data cannot be deleted, only corrected", shape=ellipse, color=lightyellow];granularity[label="Granularity
Financial data should be represented at smallest grain", shape=ellipse, color=lightyellow];idempotency[label="Idempotency
Ensure no duplicate entries", shape=ellipse, color=lightyellow];}subgraph cluster_best_practices{label="Best Practices";style=dashed;integers[label="Prefer Integers
for financial amounts", shape=ellipse, color=lightcoral];precision[label="Ensure Precision
Currency conversion should minimize loss", shape=ellipse, color=lightcoral];rounding[label="Consistent Rounding
Always round consistently", shape=ellipse, color=lightcoral];delay_conversion[label="Delay Currency Conversion
until after aggregation", shape=ellipse, color=lightcoral];timestamp[label="Use Integer Time
Avoid timestamp parsing issues", shape=ellipse, color=lightcoral];}GL->subledger[label="Contains transactions"];GL->financial_record[label="Part of financial record"];subledger->financial_record[label="Part of financial record"];financial_record->materiality[label="Influences materiality"];accurate->auditable[label="Ensures auditability"];accurate->timely[label="Ensures timeliness"];immutability->accurate[label="Ensures accuracy"];immutability->auditable[label="Supports auditability"];granularity->accurate[label="Ensures data completeness"];granularity->auditable[label="Helps debug discrepancies"];idempotency->accurate[label="Prevents duplicate entries"];integers->granularity[label="Supports precise calculations"];precision->granularity[label="Supports accuracy"];rounding->accurate[label="Prevents discrepancies"];delay_conversion->granularity[label="Maintains precision"];timestamp->accurate[label="Avoids time-related bugs"];financial_record->accurate;financial_record->auditable;financial_record->timely;immutability->granularity;immutability->idempotency;}
